meanings.definition: Covered with or characterized by shrubs.
meanings.sent1: The garden became shrubbier after planting new bushes.
meanings.sent2: The forest floor was much shrubbier than the open meadow.
meanings.sent3: The shrubbier path made it challenging to find the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts grew shrubbier as she wandered deeper into the woods.
meanings.sent5: The shrubbier landscape painted a picture of tranquility and seclusion.

meanings.definition: Having more shrubs than something else.
meanings.sent1: The shrubbier area of the park attracted more birds.
meanings.sent2: His backyard was shrubbier than his neighbor's, providing more privacy.
meanings.sent3: The shrubbier side of the street seemed like a secret garden.
meanings.sent4: The shrubbier section of the yard was a green oasis in the desert of grass.
meanings.sent5: The shrubbier hedge created a natural barrier between the properties.
